sentence.text: To identify the disease-causing defect in these families, we first analysed embryo development ending in birth or egg hatching gene, then some candidate genes (CHX10, OPA1, MITF, SOX2, CRYBB1-3 and CRYBA4) and loci (MCOP1, NNO1 and embryo development ending in birth or egg hatching) previously implicated in different forms of microphthalmia.

entity.text: embryo development ending in birth or egg hatching
embryo development ending in birth or egg hatching
